page.title: 14My mum when she was my age.
page.content: My mum's name is Sandra.She used to live in Curlender Close up our street. When she was naughty, she was locked in the front room and it was usually very dark.She went to{Laird Street {School}which is now called{Portland {School}.My mum used to wear a green uniform every day.My mum was born in her house.My mum had a pet called Rusty.Rusty died because he got trapped under the sideboard and somebody had to come and pull him out. He couldn't move his legs,so he was put down.My mum has no brothers or sisters.The meals at home were not very nice but you would have to eat them or else go to bed!New Year,Easter and Christmas were good but you didn't get many presents.My mum played out with a boy who kept throwing snails at her;she didn't like it! By :_ Christine.
